required.name: Belarus
required.note:
Visas are issued on arrival at the Minsk International Airport
if the support documents were submitted not later than 3 business days before expected date of arrival.

required.name: China
required.note: 72-hours visa free visit when in transit at Beijing, Chengdu, Chongqing, Dalian, Guangzhou, Guilin, Shanghai, Shenyang and Xi'an. Visas for Canadian citizens are valid for up to 10 years (not exceeding the passport's expiration date) for a $100.00 CAD processing fee.

required.name: Iran
required.note: Except for Kish Island. Valid for 14 days.

required.name: Iraq
required.note: Visa on arrival for 15 days at Erbil and Sulaymaniyah airports.

required.name: Nauru
required.note: Criminal record and medical fitness certificates are not required for Canadian citizens.

required.name: Pakistan
required.note: Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days. Conditions apply. Visa on arrival when travelling as part of a group through a designated tour operator.

required.name: Russia
required.note: Cruise ship passengers cruising in and out of a Russian port within 72 hours, who spend each night on board, and who only leave the ship on tours organized by the cruise company, do not require a tourist visa.

required.name: Turkmenistan
required.note: Diplomatic passports can obtain a free visa on arrival.

required.name: Vietnam
required.note:
Prearranged visa obtained online through travel agencies available at Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Phu Quoc or Da Nang airports.
Phú Quốc Visa exemption for up to 30 days.

not-required.name: Argentina
not-required.note: Visa is not required for visits up to 90 days but a reciprocity fee USD $92 for multiple entries valid for the duration of the passport must be paid online in advance.

not-required.name: Brazil
not-required.note: Temporary visa waiver, for a stay up to 90 days, is in place in 2016 between June 1 and September 18.

not-required.name: Colombia
not-required.note: Visa free for up to 90 days but a reciprocity fee of USD $50 must be paid on arrival; tourists whose final destination is San Andrés, Providencia and Santa Catalina are excluded from the fee.

not-required.name: Denmark
not-required.note: Citizens of Canada can freely enter and stay in Denmark for up to 90 days every six months, regardless of whether they have stayed in another Schengen area (except the other Nordic countries) country prior to entry into Denmark.

not-required.name: Dominican Republic
not-required.note: 90 days (10 USD Tourist Card must be purchased upon arrival)

not-required.name: France
not-required.note: 90 days within 180 days (in Regions of France)

not-required.name: Grenada
not-required.note: 3 months; may enter on an ID card if not departing from the United States.

not-required.name: Mexico
not-required.note: 180 days. Canadian citizens with diplomatic or official (Special) passports require a Visa.

evisa.name: Australia
evisa.note: 90 days on each visit in 12-month period

evisa.name: Ivory Coast
evisa.note: 3 months; eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

evisa.name: Kenya
evisa.note: 3 months; also visa on arrival until 1 September 2015

evisa.name: Myanmar
evisa.note: 28 days. eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports.

evisa.name: Turkey
evisa.note: 3 months Cruise ship passengers cruising in and out of a Turkish port within a single day do not require a tourist visa.

on-arrival.name: Cambodia
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Visa is also obtainable online.

on-arrival.name: Lebanon
on-arrival.note: 1 month extendable for 2 additional months; granted free of charge at Beirut International Airport or any other port of entry if there is no Israeli visa or seal, holding a telephone number, an address in Lebanon, and a non refundable return or circle trip ticket.

on-arrival.name: Paraguay
on-arrival.note: 90 days. Visa on arrival issued only at Silvio Pettirossi International Airport in Asunción for incoming travelers. Travelers arriving otherwise (e.g. at a land border) one must have obtained their visa prior.

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note:
30 days, provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.

on-arrival.name: Tajikistan
on-arrival.note: 45 days at Dushanbe International Airport. Visa also available online. E-visa holders can enter through all border points.

on-arrival.name: United Arab Emirates
on-arrival.note: 40 days (multiple). Visa on arrival is obtained free of charge.

on-arrival.name: Zambia
on-arrival.note: 90 days; also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zimbabwe.

on-arrival.name: Zimbabwe
on-arrival.note: 3 months; also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zambia.
